author: Michael Rubinkam
title: Hay fever or virus? For allergy sufferers, season of worry...
description: Hay fever or virus? For allergy sufferers, season of worry... (Second column, 2nd story, link ) Related stories: REPORT: Corona could have spread among humans for years or even decades... Drudge Report Feed needs your support! Become a Patron
content:
HAMBURG, Pa. (AP) The spring breezes of 2020 are carrying more than just tree pollen. Theres a whiff of paranoia in the air.
For millions of seasonal allergy sufferers, the annual onset of watery eyes and scratchy throats is bumping up against the global spr… [+5664 chars]
